ygData.subject: Re: Interesting Benefit of Charismatic Carralion
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Same here.  Indifferent to amiable, no change in price. I tried it on the Oasis gypsies too.  They didn t even change to amiable. On another note, about
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 3 Jun 1999, Rogers Pessin wrote:
>
> I went and visited the shady swashbuckler in the tunnel between east
> commons and north ro. He is normally indifferent to me. I checked
> his price on a couple of weapons then sung the charismatic song and
> he became amiable to me. He still wanted the same amount of money
> for those well balanced weapons though.

Same here. Indifferent to amiable, no change in price.

I tried it on the Oasis gypsies too. They didn't even change
to amiable.

On another note, about using the song to get quests you
normally don't have access to; you can also use it to help
*complete* quests that require faction. I'm not sure if I
should /bug this (probably will and let them decide). There
are several NPCs who won't offer you services/items until
you've gained enough faction with them. The song can help
shortcut it.

No, it doesn't work on the Squad Ring. :-) Though my hunch
is that it can cut down considerably on the number of
necklaces and belts you have to turn in to get the ring.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
